skillTree.localised_description: The warriors of Ruin rely on great Heroes, to usher in a new age of anarchy.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: "One bad road can kill a man – unless you're me."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +100% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: "We show no remorse for the deeds of death and destruction!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description:
"A lifeless object, alive!
	Awaiting Reprisal!
	Death will be their acquittance!"

effects.description:
Weakness to Fire Damage: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

Leadership: +10 when fighting against Undead
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "They're infected with death, they know they have to die."

effects.description:
Double experience gain for units when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description:
"Never break it, it will never bend!
	The Anvil was forged in fire!"

"This world has come undone
	Armageddon has arrived...
	...in the shape of a killing machine!"
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: A true tactician inspires all around them, encouraging allies to acts of vicious abandon.
Domination is the only goal, under the banner of Chaos Undivided.
Unleash pure Chaos at close quarters, slicing and dicing all within reach.
A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

items.colour_text: Discharging a magical blast every time it is struck, Harry’s Bane Shield rebounds his enemies blows back from whence they came.
As if driven by an unstoppable force, Harry’s hammer is blessed by the gods to hurl back the bodies and souls of those he strikes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Causes severe disruption to enemy formations

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The dead may rest uneasily in the Chaos Wastes, yet Harry has no shortage of foes across the world upon which to vent his anger.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -25 with Vampiric factions and Followers of Nagash

Immune to Vampiric attrition
	(armies in region regardless of ownership)
